row.process:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.COMMON_LOGGING
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JQL Expression" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_JQL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Maximum result" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_MAX_RESULT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION !------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Action name : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "ListIssuesAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
! JQL Expression : IF &UC4RB_JIRA_JQL# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_JQL# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -jql &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Maximum result : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -maxresult &UC4RB_JIRA_MAX_RESULT#")
! Logging the java command to be invoked : PRINT "Prepared Command : &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#"
! Password is decrypted and sent to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Invoking java binary : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" : CASE "UNIX" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LIST ISSUES ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LIST ISSUES ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
!Publish the issue keys location :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_JIRA_TOTAL_ISSUES" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_TOTAL_ISSUES# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_TOTAL_ISSUES#,,"TOP"
: CASE "UC4RB_JIRA_RETRIEVED_ISSUES" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_RETRIEVED_ISSUES# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_RETRIEVED_ISSUES#,,"TOP"
: CASE "UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEYS" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEYS# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEYS#,,"TOP" : ENDSWITCH
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_JIRA_TOTAL_ISSUES# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_JIRA_RETRIEVED_ISSUES# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEYS# = "" :ENDIF
